name: SuDs masterclass - water management and maintenance
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: It is not enough to specify and install a SuDs scheme. The initial design needs to be considered with maintenance in mind so that the implications for water management and ongoing maintenance are understood and a maintenance programme prepared at the outset.
